name: Tiny Rails
description: Your grandfather has handed down his train company and it's up to you to expand your modest locomotive into a multi-car masterpiece. Upgrade and customize your train while unlocking new stations, delivering passengers and trading supplies all around the world!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or greater Processor: 1.5 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 500 MB available space
